for _ in range(int(input())):
    s = input()
    b = list(s)
    print('yes' if b == sorted(b) else 'no')

n = int(input())
c = 0
for i in range(n):
    s = input()
    x = list(s)
    l = list(s)
    l.sort()
    k = 0
    c = 0
    for j in x:
        if j == l[k]:
            c = c + 1
            k = k + 1
    if c == len(s):
        print('yes')
    else:
        print('no')
